item.title: NVIDIA announcements, news and more, from GTC 2025
item.description: At GTC, NVIDIA unveiled major advancements – from the Blackwell Ultra AI platform to advancements in robotics and accelerated computing.

item.title: OpenAI launches o3 and o4-mini, AI models that ‘think with images’ and use tools autonomously

item.title: 404-GEN integrates decentralized 3D model generation platform with Unity
item.description: 404-GEN today announced it has become the first decentralized 3D model generation platform to integrate with Unity.

item.title: VoicePatrol unveils real-time AI voice protection for games
item.description: VoicePatrol is unveiling its real-time AI voice protection technology for game studios to make gaming communities safer.
